professionalSummary: Results-driven food service professional with current experience as a Key Holder at The Chopped Leaf and a proven track record in healthy food preparation. Demonstrated expertise in kitchen operations, food safety, and customer service excellence. Known for maintaining high standards of cleanliness and efficiency while ensuring exceptional guest experience in fast-paced environments.
qualifications: Over 1 year of Canadian food service experience in reputable establishments
Current hands-on experience with The Chopped Leaf operations and procedures
Proven ability to maintain food safety standards and kitchen sanitation
Strong knowledge of healthy food preparation and portion control
Demonstrated excellence in customer service and team collaboration
Flexible availability including evenings and weekends

responsibilities: Prepare and assemble fresh bowls, salads, and wraps according to company standards
Monitor and maintain salad bar and ingredient inventory
Process customer payments accurately using POS system
Maintain spotless work areas and kitchen equipment
Collaborate effectively with kitchen staff and team members
Follow portion control and presentation guidelines
Prepared and served menu items following standardized recipes
Operated POS system and handled customer transactions accurately
Maintained cleanliness of work areas, counters, and dining areas
Collaborated with team members during peak hours
Ensured consistent product quality and customer satisfaction
Provided patient care and administered treatments
Maintained detailed records and followed strict sanitation protocols
Demonstrated strong attention to detail in a fast-paced environment
Assisted with warehouse operations and aid organization
Demonstrated ability to work in team-oriented environment
